ship.brief: Get detailed information about a ship
description: Display characteristics of a requested warship.
For more detailed information of a specific paramater, enclose the parameter names in a pair of paranthesis after the ship name.
Example:
mackbot ship midway (Return information about US CV Midway)
mackbot ship midway (bombers) (Return detailed information about Midway's dive bombers)
mackbot ship midway compact (Return information about Midway in compact format)
About Mackbot's AA rating:
Mackbot's AA rating (mAAr) is a value based on the continuous damage, flak, and range of a warship's AA and is scaled to the warship's tier.

skill.brief: Get information about a commander skill
description: Display information about a commander skill.
ship_type: Can take full ship type name or abbreviation (e.g. "bb" or "battleship")

show.brief: show all items of a specifed category
description: show all items of a specifed category.
showings may returns in multiple pages. Add "page x" to access other pages.
show all commander skills.
Filter may include tier or ship types.
Example:
mackbot show skills tier 1 (shows all commander skills that cost 1 point)
mackbot show skills bb (shows all battleship commander skills)
show all ship upgrades.
Filter may include tier that upgrades appear in or ship types.
Example:
mackbot show upgrades tier 4 (show all upgrades that is available at tier 4
show all maps
show all available warships.
Filter may include ship type, tier, and/or nation

upgrade.brief: Get detail of a ship's upgrade
description: Get detail of a warship's upgrade.
This command can take either the full name of an upgrade, or a ship's name if it have a legendary upgrade.
Example:
mackbot upgrade csm1 (Get detailed information about Concealment System Modification 1)
mackbot upgrade midway (Get detailed information about Midway's legendary upgrade, Modified External Hardpoints)

commander.brief: Get detail of a unique commander
description: Get details about a commander and some of their special abilities.
Show image of a specifed map

doubloons.brief: Display the doubloons to dollar conversion
description: Get the money conversion value of doubloons to USD or vice versa.
Example:
mackbot doubloons 1000 (Get the amount of USD for 1000 doubloons)
mackbot doubloons 10 $ (Get the amount of doubloons for 10 USD)

code.brief: Generate a WoWS bonus code link
description: Generate a WoWS bonus code link.
For multiple links, separate the codes with spaces.
Give a WoWS hot take

player.brief: Provide general information about a player
description: Provide general information about a player (i.e. battle count, average frags, average damage, etc.)
[battle_type] - Optional: Acceptable values: solo, div2, div3
Usage example:
mackbot player your_username_here (Get information about your account)
mackbot player your_username_here div2 (Get information about your 2-man division)
Invite mackbot to your server(s)
